title: Warframe Gift Pack Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Warframe Gift Pack key and unlock in-game items for Warframe! Each pack includes the Dual Heat Swords, Pyra Sugatra, and a 3-day Affinity Booster.
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your free Alienware Arena account and click the button to unlock your key.
3. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.
platforms: PC, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Android, iOS

title: The Elder Scrolls Online: Experience Scroll Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free The Elder Scrolls Online: Experience Scroll Key and unlock a (3x) Grand Gold coast Experience Scroll. This scroll will give you 150% Experience Point bonus from all sources for 1 hour.
instructions:
1. Log in or register to your free Alienware Arena account.
2. Click the button to unlock your key and follow the giveaway instructions.
platforms: PC, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One

title: The Elder Scrolls Online: Pyromancer's Quandary Emote Key Giveaway
description: Are you playing The Elder Scrolls Online? Claim your free gift Key, unlock the Pyromancer's Quandary Emote and ignite the world!
instructions:

2. Log in or register to your free Alienware Arena account.
3. Click the button to unlock your key and follow the giveaway instructions.
platforms: PC, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One

title: Destiny 2 Emblem Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free SteelSeries Destiny 2 Emblem Key and dive into the world of Destiny 2!
instructions:

title: Genshin Impact Free Primogems Code (Updated!)
description:
Claim your free code for Genshin Impact and receive Primogems at no cost! Each code unlocks 50 Primogems plus more! Please note that you need to be at least Rank 10 to use these codes. Redeem your code now before expires!

New Codes:
GA9FPD42SJ4V - (60 Primogems + 5 Adventurer's Experience)
GS6ACJ775KNV - (60 Primogems & 10,000 Mora)
GENSHINGIFT - (50 Primogems)
instructions:
1. Click the "Get loot button" and create your Genshin Impact account.
2. Start the game and reach adventure Rank 10 before using these codes.
3. Then go to the Genshin Impact website and click the "Redeem Code" at the top menu and insert your code.

*Please note this codes will expire soon, and will only work on the PC and mobile versions.

title: Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code
description:

instructions:

title: Free Rocket League Codes
description:
Rocket League is giving away free in-game items, to unlock those items you just need to use the codes below. Please note the base game is required to play this DLC content.

Active Codes:
popcorn

This codes will expire soon so redeem the code now!
instructions:
1. Launch Rocket League (Via Steam, XB1 or PS4)
2. Go to "Extras"; in the Main Menu and select "Redeem Code" then enter the code: popcorn.

title: Destiny 2: Free Emblem Codes
description:
Score free in-game Emblems for Destiny 2! You just need to redeem the codes bellow. Best of all, it's free! If anyone knows other Emblem codes, please feel free to share them! Please note that emblem codes probably have an expiration date, and will not work once expired

    X9FGMAH6D
    XFV-KHP-N97
    A7LFYC44X
    JDT-NLC-JKM
    N3LXN6PXF
    7CP-94V-LFP
    FJ9-LAM-67F
    7F9-767-F74
    X4C-FGX-MX3
    JD7-4CM-HJG
    JNX-DMH-XLA
    3VF-LGC-RLX
instructions:
1. Redeem your Emblem code at https://www.bungie.net/en/User/coderedemption
2. That's it! Have fun!

title: Free Bethesda In-Game Bundle
description: Claim your free Bethesda In-Game Bundle and unlock in-game items for Fallout 76, DOOM: The Dark Ages and DOOM Eternal.
instructions:
1. Log in to your Bethesda account and opt in to email communications
2. Selected the "CLAIM NOW" button
3. Click on the profile icon in the top right corner of the screen
4. Choose “Transaction History” from the drop-down menu, and view the Product Codes tab.
